name: animegami
description: This website is an ad-free alternative that hosts all your favourite anime for you to watch It provides descriptions and scores of all titles, both courtsey of MyAnimeList , and efficiently categorizes them for ease of access. Credits: ArgonSodiumVanadium License: Apache 2.0
author: arnav rustagi <arnrustagi@gmail.com> (https://github.com/argonsodiumvanadium)

scripts.start: npm run build && npm run dev
